H0.text: Astrakhan is the curly hair of which young animal. Kid (goat)

H1.text: Astrakhan is the curly hair of which young animal. Calf

H2.text: Astrakhan is the curly hair of which young animal. Foal

H3.text: Astrakhan is the curly hair of which young animal. Lamb

A4.text: Astrakhan (Russian and French) is one of the names for newborn karakul sheep pelts.

A5.text: Newborn lambs have a tight, curly pattern of hair.
